## mapPush() function

Used with maps that store arrays. Where an array exists for a given key the value will be appended to that array, otherwise a new array will be created containing the value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapPush<TKey extends object, TValue>(map: WeakMap<TKey, TValue[]>, key: TKey, value: TValue): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | WeakMap&lt;TKey, TValue\[\]&gt; | The <code>Map</code> to check. May be modified. |
|  key | TKey | The key to lookup in <code>map</code>. |
|  value | TValue | The value to push. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

See [mapPush()](./rc-js-util.mappush.md)<!-- -->.
